import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { FiPlay, FiEye, FiClock, FiYoutube, FiInstagram } from 'react-icons/fi'; const VideoHub: React.FC = () => { const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('all'); const categories = [ { id: 'all', name: 'All Videos' }, { id: 'drone', name: 'Drone Footage' }, { id: 'food', name: 'Food Reviews' }, { id: 'tech', name: 'Tech Tools' }, { id: 'lifestyle', name: 'Lifestyle' } ]; const videos = [ { id: 1, title: "Epic Drone Footage: Sunset Over the City", description: "Capturing the perfect golden hour from 400 feet above the city skyline.", category: 'drone', thumbnail: "ðŸŒ…", views: "15.2K", duration: "3:45", platform: 'youtube', featured: true }, { id: 2, title: "Best Pizza in Town -
